content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Claim_procedure (
	[Claim_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[procedure_reference] nvarchar(4000),
	[procedure_sequence] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Claim_procedure',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ext.Claim_procedure
GO


IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Observation_category (
	[Observation_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[category_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[category_display] nvarchar(4000),
	[category_system] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Observation_category',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ext.Observation_category
GO

	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Observation_code (
	[Observation_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[code_text] nvarchar(4000),
	[coding_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[coding_display] nvarchar(4000),
	[coding_system] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Observation_code',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

GO


IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Observation_component (
	[Observation_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_display] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_system] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_text] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_valueQuantity_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_valueQuantity_system] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_valueQuantity_unit] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_valueQuantity_value] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Observation_component',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ext.Observation_component
GO



IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Observation_main (
	[Observation_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[resourceType] nvarchar(4000),
	[issued] nvarchar(4000),
	[status] nvarchar(4000),
	[patient_id_reference] nvarchar(4000),
	[encounter_id_reference] nvarchar(4000),
	[effectiveDateTime] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueQuantity_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueQuantity_system] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueQuantity_unit] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueQuantity_value] float,
	[valueString] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Observation_main',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ext.Observation_main
GO



IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Observation_calueCodeableConcept (
	[Observation_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueCodeableConcept_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueCodeableConcept_display] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueCodeableConcept_system] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueCodeableConcept_text] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Observation_valueCodeableConcept/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ext.Observation_calueCodeableConcept
GO
